name: Π (PI)
description:
This game was made back in 2013

This is an original puzzle adventure with a childish-silly story (think Kirby).

Short Story Summary
Our protagonist lives in Rounds Ville where evidently all the residents are spherical. One day his whole village gets sucked by something called a vortex, and it's now his turn to play the role of the hero.

Game play
-Simple "get from point A to point B" scenarios
-When the player steps on a passable tile, the path is revealed
-9 Levels

Follow my work at:
